title: How to Remove Fleas from Your Dog Using Coffee

steps.headline: Make yourself coffee as usual and keep aside the coffee grounds.
Shampoo your dog as usual.
steps.description: After shampooing, rub the coffee grounds thoroughly through your dog's coat as your dog stands in the bathing area.

steps.headline: Rinse off the coffee grounds and allow your dog to dry as usual.
steps.description: The coffee grounds will have helped to remove the fleas from your dog. You may need to groom out some of the grounds that aren't shaken off by Fido.

text: Make yourself coffee as usual and keep aside the coffee grounds.  Shampoo your dog as usual. After shampooing, rub the coffee grounds thoroughly through your dog's coat as your dog stands in the bathing area. Rinse off the coffee grounds and allow your dog to dry as usual. The coffee grounds will have helped to remove the fleas from your dog. You may need to groom out some of the grounds that aren't shaken off by Fido.
